    üñºÔ∏è Image Management Guide
    
      
    
        
    Directory Structure:
    
        
    /images/
  posts/           ‚Üê Blog post images
  publications/    ‚Üê Publication figures
  profile.jpg      ‚Üê Your profile photo

    
        
        
    Image Formats:
    
        
    
          
    
            Basic Image:
            ![Alt text](/images/posts/image.jpg)
          
    
          
    
            With Caption:
            ![Figure 1](/images/posts/image.jpg)
    *Caption text here*    		
          
    
          
    
            Centered:
            <img src="/images/posts/image.jpg" alt="Description" style="display: block; margin: 2em auto; max-width: 80%;">
          
    
          
    
            With Size:
            <img src="/images/posts/image.jpg" alt="Description" width="600">
          
    
        
    
        
        
    Best Practices:
    
        
      
          
    • Optimize images: Keep file size under 1-2 MB
      • 
          
    • Use descriptive names: sac-algorithm-diagram.png not img1.png
      • 
          
    • Formats: JPG for photos, PNG for diagrams/screenshots, SVG for vectors
      • 
          
    • Alt text: Always include for accessibility
      • 
          
    • Dimensions: 1200px width is good for blog posts
      • 
        
    
        
        
    Example Post with Images:
    
        
    ---

    Publication Management
    
      
    
        
    Quick Guide:
    
        
      
          
    • Add new publication: Create a new .md file in /_publications/
      • 
          
    • Edit publication: Modify the corresponding .md file
      • 
          
    • Add Q index: Add qindex: 'Q1' in the frontmatter
      • 
          
    • Categories: Use category: 'manuscripts' or 'conferences'
      • 
        
    
        
        
    Template for New Publication:
    
        
    ---
title: "Your Paper Title"
ID: XM
collection: publications
permalink: /publication/your-paper-slug
category: 'manuscripts'
excerpt: 'Brief description'
date: YYYY-MM-DD
venue: 'Journal Name'
qindex: 'Q1'
paperurl: 'https://doi.org/...'
citation: 'Author names. (Year). "Title." Journal.'
---

Full abstract here.

[Download paper here](paperurl)

    
      
    
    
    

    
    
      
    Useful Commands
    
      
    
        
    
          Build site locally:
          jekyll serve -l -H localhost
        
    
        
    
          Push to GitHub:
          git add . && git commit -m "Update" && git push
        
    
        
    
          Check for errors:
          jekyll build --verbose
